text:
Mano, how does it feel?
Are you comfortable in the costume?

Y-Yes,
I managed to put it on...

I see, then excuse me for a moment...
Oh! It suits you well.

U-Um, thank you... The stylist made
some adjustments for me...

Haha, yeah... ──Is there anything else bothering you?
Any discomfort when you move around?

Yes, I tried moving around earlier
and didn't notice any issues... Oh.

Hm, what's wrong?
If there's something, let me know now.

N-nothing... Um, well... I was thinking of taking a photo
in the costume for social media, like for Twesta.

I want a full-body shot, so could
I ask you to take it, Producer-san?

Oh, that's easy.
If that's all, feel free to ask anytime.
